extendedInfo.description: The best free live Wallpapers in market and best choice of free applications for desktop themes on 2013 year.All resolutions supported.Features:- Animated slides HD Live Wallpaper - Ripple effects- Fade effect- Live snowfall.- All in settingsWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and or home screen. This will help keep it free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app (Drag and Drop to the garbage).How to use: Home -----> Menu -----> Wallpapers -----> Live WallpapersYou can optout notification ads from: Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.comSendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-outTags: free live wallpapers, Happy Valentine, Valentine's day, Heart, love, LWP, Live Themes, HD wallpapers, Free Wallpapers, custom Backgrounds, HD Images, pictures, images.

reviews.title: Good but too many advertisments
reviews.comment: This wallpaper is really neat. But it could go without all of the apps poppung up out of nowhere.
reviews.author: Tedd Dugan
